attributes.action: Wave visa entry restrictions for Ukrainians during the current conflict
attributes.additional_details: It is our ethical duty to support Ukrainians fleeing the conflict with Russia by providing safe harbour in the UK for Ukrainian refugees.
attributes.background: Allow visa-free entry to the UK for Ukrainians fleeing the conflict with Russia.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Wave visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
